Right/left multiplication

Source: R/utils-export.R
right_mult.Rd

Performs right and left multiplication.

right_mult(kernel, vectr)

left_mult(kernel, vectr)

Arguments

kernel, vectr

kernel should be a bivariate kernel, vectr should be a univariate trait distribution.

Value

left_mult returns t(kernel) %*% vectr. right_multreturns kernel %*% vectr.

Contents

Developed by Sam Levin, Aldo Compagnoni, Dylan Childs, Sanne Evers, Roberto Salguero-Gomez, Tiffany Knight.
